name: Ruan Mei

traceMaterials.itemName: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

story: A member of the Genius Society and an expert in life sciences. She teamed up with Herta and the others to develop the Simulated Universe.

skills.name: Threading Fragrance
skills.description: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: String Sings Slow Swirls
skills.description: After using her Skill, Ruan Mei gains Overtone. When Ruan Mei has Overtone, increase all allies' DMG and Weakness Break efficiency.

skills.name: Petals to Stream, Repose in Dream
skills.description: Increases All-Type RES PEN for all allies, and their attacks apply Thanatoplum Rebloom to enemies hit.

skills.name: Somatotypical Helix
skills.description: Increases SPD for all allies. Breaking an enemy target's Weakness will additionally deal Ice Break DMG.

skills.name: Silken Serenade
skills.description: Automatically triggers this unit's Skill for #1[i] times the next time they enter battle. After using the Technique, allies attacking enemies in Simulated Universe will be considered as entering battle after attacking their Weakness, and their Toughness is depleted regardless of Weakness types. With every Blessing currently in possession, increases Toughness DMG and Break DMG dealt when actively attacking enemies to enter battle.

eidolons.name: Neuronic Embroidery
eidolons.description: While the Ultimate's field is deployed, the DMG dealt by all allies ignores 20% of the target's DEF.

eidolons.name: Reedside Promenade
eidolons.description: With Ruan Mei on the field, all allies increase their ATK by 40% when dealing DMG to enemies with Weakness Break.

eidolons.name: Viridescent Pirouette
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Chatoyant Éclat
eidolons.description: When an enemy target's Weakness is Broken, Ruan Mei's Break Effect increases by 100% for 3 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Languid Barrette
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Sash Cascade
eidolons.description: Extends the duration of the Ultimate's field by 1 turn(s). The Talent's Break DMG multiplier additionally increases by 200%.
